mapper.sql: aa.id AS t_activity_id, aa.title AS t_activity_title, aa.start_time AS t_activity_start_time, aa.end_time AS t_activity_end_time, aa.price AS t_activity_price, aa.img AS t_activity_img, aa.content AS t_activity_content, aa.is_online AS t_activity_is_online
a.id AS t_address_id, a.name AS t_address_name
ad.id AS t_address_detail_id, ad.name AS t_address_detail_name, ad.address_id AS t_address_detail_address_id
u.id AS t_activity_type_id, u.name AS t_activity_type_name, u.sequence AS t_activity_type_sequence, u.is_deleted AS t_activity_type_is_deleted
mapper.update: UPDATE t_activity SET is_online = 'Y' WHERE id = #{id}
